info.name: ZZZZ Flickr - (GM) - Multi Group Sender
info.description: Quick Userstyle Adaptation for a Greasemonkey script : GM Script Flickr Multi Group Sender by Steeev . What it does ?: Correct The PopUP Position ..... IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey
info.additionalInfo: It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers - DACKR Viewer For More information on Scripts and Addons that i use a lot with FLICKR: ► My BIG LIST - may 2012. (in Flickr Hacks discuss) ► Userscripts Group : "Flickr ★ Surf" (USO :8080)
